title: High Engagement Signals
description: Signs that a conversation participant is actively involved and interested

examples.context: Group chat discussion about a TV show

conversation.speaker: User 1
conversation.message: OMG that plot twist in the finale was INSANE!! ðŸ¤¯ I did NOT see that coming!
conversation.note: High energy, exclamation points, emoji, capitalization

conversation.speaker: User 2
conversation.message: RIGHT?? I was SCREAMING at my TV!! ðŸ¤¯ The way they set it up was brilliant!
conversation.note: Matching energy, similar punctuation and emoji use

conversation.speaker: User 1
conversation.message: I've actually been a fan since season 1, and this was honestly the best episode for me. What got you into the show?
conversation.note: Personal sharing and invitation for deeper connection

examples.explanation: User 2 matches User 1's excitement level, capitalization, and even uses the same emoji, showing high engagement. User 1 recognizes this and moves toward a more personal conversation.

conversation.speaker: Colleague A
conversation.message: I just finished that big project I was working on.

conversation.speaker: Colleague B
conversation.message: That's great! What was the most challenging part for you? And did you learn anything unexpected during the process?

conversation.speaker: Colleague A
conversation.message: Actually, the technical aspects were easier than I expected. The real challenge was balancing different stakeholder needs. I learned I'm better at negotiation than I thought!
conversation.note: Detailed, open response rewarding the curiosity

examples.explanation: Colleague B shows high engagement by asking thoughtful follow-up questions. Colleague A responds with detailed insights that wouldn't have been shared without the curious prompting.
